Detailed Description

One Intersection of curve and surface.

If more than one are necessary to hold, CSisect_list should be used. Curve と Surface の交点を表現する。

int MGCSisect::manifold_dimension (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return the manifold dimension of the intersection, i.e.

0: when the intersection is a point, 1: when is a curve, 2: when is a surface.
